headline: EOG Resources, Inc. (EOG) Resources Hit by Downgrade, Eyes Utica Upside
summary: EOG Resources, Inc. (NYSE:EOG) is one of the best cheap stocks to buy for 2026. On January 16, KeyBanc analyst Tim Rezvan downgraded EOG Resources, Inc. (NYSE:EOG) from Overweight to Sector Weight. Rezvan cited concerns about deteriorating well productivity in EOG’s core Texas operations. The analyst pointed to clear signs of degradation in both the […]

headline: EOG Resources (EOG) Outlook Adjusted as RBC Trims 2026 Oil Assumptions
summary: EOG Resources Inc. (NYSE:EOG) ranks among the stocks with the lowest forward PE ratios. On January 13, RBC Capital cut its price target for EOG Resources Inc. (NYSE:EOG) to $138 from $145 and retained an Outperform rating on the company. The decrease reflects RBC’s revised commodity price projection, especially for oil, with the firm now […]
